fungechist.description: Drafted into service as a chemist to the Mushroom Barons of the Soft Tops the fungechists always keep Ou in their minds.
fungechist.name: fungechist

irascible_dandy.description: Lounging around the taverns of the Soft Tops they can be found one word away from an indignant splutter and a grasp for their sword.
irascible_dandy.name: irascible dandy
